GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article from the articles table that has an article_id that matches the parametric endpoint

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves comments from the comments table that have an article_id that matches the parametric endpoint

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to the comments table, the comment has an article_id that matches the parametric endpoint, then returns the comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an article's votes value using an object that contains a modifier value

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment based on the comment_id parametric endpoint

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
